name: Daggermaster
text: You and your dagger become one as you master the intricacies of battling with the blade. You are an expert with the dagger, able to employ your weapon in ways that no lesser rogue can match.

features.daggerPrecision(11thLevel): When you use a rogue or a daggermaster attack power with a dagger, the power can score a critical hit on a roll of 18â€“20
features.daggermaster'sAction(11thLevel): You can spend an action point to reroll an attack roll or a damage roll you make using a dagger, instead of taking an extra action
features.daggerAdvantage(16thLevel): When you score a critical hit with a dagger, the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn
